description:
Siguma Squad goes to Minato Kai headquarters to avenge their injured comrades. The Minato side claims that their members were jumped by Siguma. Sensing something afoot, Matakara asks Mahoro and Arajin to persuade Marito to prevent an inevitable gang war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Non à la guerre ! ~ Un sauté de margose ne fait pas de mal ~
Stop War! Toki ni wa Shoku Seyo Gouya Chanpuru
Stop the War! Sometimes You Gotta Eat Goya Chanpuru
ストップ戦争[ウォー]! ~時には食せよゴーヤチャンプルー~
